info.title: Clinic Management API
info.description: A comprehensive ASP.NET Core Web API for managing hospital operations including appointments, schedules, doctors, and patients.

get.summary: Gets appointments for the logged-in doctor
Gets a single appointment by ID
Gets appointments for a specific patient

post.summary: Marks an appointment as completed (Doctor only)

get.summary: Advanced search for appointments with pagination, sorting, and filtering.

post.summary: Authenticates a user with email and password and returns a JWT token and user info.

requestBody.description: Login request DTO containing Email and Password.
Request DTO containing doctor creation data (Clinic_Management_System.DTOs.Doctors.DoctorCreateRequestDto).

get.summary: Retrieves schedules for a specified doctor.

post.summary: Returns available appointment slots for a doctor in a given date/time range.

requestBody.description: Request DTO describing the doctor and date range (Clinic_Management_System.DTOs.Schedules.AvailableSlotsRequestDto).

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all patients.

Retrieves a patient by identifier.
If the caller is a Doctor (non-Admin), access is validated against the doctor's appointments.

post.summary:
Creates a new user with the specified role. Allowed roles are "Doctor" and "Receptionist".
When creating a Doctor user, additional doctor-specific fields are required and a Clinic_Management_System.Models.Doctor entity will be created.

requestBody.description: The Clinic_Management_System.DTOs.Auth.UserCreateRequestDto containing user and role information.

Bearer.description:
Enter 'Bearer' followed by a space and then your valid JWT token.

Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...
